dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only person I told was my shrink...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what'd he do when you told him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nailed me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very nice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think that from a legal standpoint what he did can be construed as rape since I paid him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's an adult! Allison is relishing this attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...he's married too! Claire notes her disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you have any idea how completely gross that is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, the first few times...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First few times?  You mean he did it more than once?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you crazy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obviously she's crazy if she's screwing her shrink...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Claire)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you ever done it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't even have a psychiatrist...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you ever done it with a normal person?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, didn't we already cover this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never answered the question...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'm not gonna discuss my private life with total strangers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's kind of a double-edged sword, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, if you say you haven't... you're a prude.  If you say you have...you're a slut!  It's a trap. You want to but you can't but when you do you wish you didn't, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or, are you a tease?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's a tease...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh why don't you just forget it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a tease and you know it, all girls are teases!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Andrew)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's only a tease if what she does gets you hot...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't do anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why you're a tease...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, lemme ask you a few questions. Allison is suddenly defensive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've already told you everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Doesn't it bother you to sleep around without being in love.  I mean don't you want any respect?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't screw to get respect...That's the difference between you and me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not the only difference, I hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Face it, you're a tease.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not a tease!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure you are!  You said it yourself sex is a weapon, you use it to get respect!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I never said that, she twisted my words around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh then what do you use it for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't use it period! Claire is on the verge of tears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, are you medically frigid or is it psychological?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't mean it that way!  You guys are putting words into my mouth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well if you'd just answer the question...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you just answer the question?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be honest...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No big deal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, answer it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Answer the question, Claire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Talk to us! ANDREW & BRIAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, answer the question!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's easy, it's only one question! Claire silences all of them by screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (screaming)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  I never did it! Silence for two beats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never did it either, I'm not a nymphomaniac...I'm a compulsive liar...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are such a bitch!  You did that on purpose just to fuck me over!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would do it though...If you love someone it's okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe you, you're so weird.  You don't say anything all day and then when you open your mouth...you unload all these tremendous lies all over me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're just pissed off because she got you to admit something you didn't want to admit to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, fine, but that doesn't make it any less bizarre...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's bizarre?  I mean we're all pretty bizarre!  Some of us are just better at hiding it, that's all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Andrew)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you bizarre? Allison decides to field that question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can't think for himself...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's right...do you guys know what, uh, what I did to get in here?  I taped Larry Lester's buns together. Claire laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Andrew)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Brian)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you know him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then you know how hairy he is, right?  Well, when they pulled the tape off, most of his hair came off and some, some skin too...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the bizarre thing is, is that I did it for my old man...I tortured this poor kid, because I wanted him to think that I was cool. He's always going off about, you know, when he was in school...all the wild things he used to do.  And I got the feeling that he was disappointed that I never cut loose on anyone, right...So, I'm...I'm sitting in the locker room, and I'm taping up my knee.  And Larry's undressing a couple lockers down from me.  Yeah...he's kinda... he's kinda skinny, weak.  And I started thinking about my father, and his attitude about weakness. And the next thing I knew, I uh, I jumped on top of him and started wailing on him...And my friends, they just laughed and cheered me on. And afterwards, when I was sittin' in Vernon's office, all I could think about was Larry's father. And Larry havin' to go home and...and explain what happened to him.  And the humiliation...fucking humiliation he mustuv felt.  It mustuv been unreal...I mean, (he's crying)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean, how do you apologize for something like that?  There's no way...it's all because of me and my old man.  Oh God, I fucking hate him!  He's like this...he's like this mindless machine that I can't even relate to anymore..."Andrew, you've got to be number one!  I won't tolerate any losers in this family...Your intensity is for shit! Win.  Win!  WIN!!!"  You son of a bitch!  You know, sometimes, I wish my knee would give...and I wouldn't be able to wrestle anymore.  And he could forget all about me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think your old man and my old man should get together and go bowling. Andrew laughs briefly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's like me, you know, with my grades...like, when I, when I step outside myself kinda, and when I, when I look in at myself you know?  And I see me and I don't like what I see, I really don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong with you?  Why don't you like yourself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Cause I'm stupid...'cause I'm failing shop.  See we had this assignment, to make this ceramic elephant, and um...and we had eight weeks to do it and we're s'posed ta, and it was like a lamp, and when you pull the trunk the light was s'posed to go on...my light didn't go on, I got a F on it.  Never got a F in my life... When I signed up, you know, for the course I mean.  I thought I was playing it real smart, you know. 'Cause I thought, I'll take shop, it'll be such an easy way to maintain my grade point average...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you think it'd be easy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you seen some of the dopes that take shop?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I take shop...you must be a fuckin' idiot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a fuckin' idiot because I can't make a lamp?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you're a genius because you can't make a lamp...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you know about Trigonometry?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could care less about Trigonometry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bender, did you know without Trigonometry there'd be no engineering?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Without lamps, there'd be no light!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay so neither one of you is any better than the other one... Allison feels left out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can write with my toes!  I can also eat, brush my teeth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With your feet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...play Heart & Soul on the piano.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can make spaghetti!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Andrew)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What can you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can...uh...tape all your buns together...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wanna see what Claire can do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't do anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, everybody can do something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's one thing I can do, no forget it, it's way too embarrassing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You ever seen Wild Kingdom?  I mean that guy's been doing that show for thirty years.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, but you have to swear to God you won't laugh...I can't believe I'm actually doing this... Claire takes lipstick out and opens it.  She places it between her breasts and applies it from her cleavage. When she lifts her head, her lipstick is perfect. Everyone claps.  Bender's clap is sarcastic and slow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, great!  Where'd you learn to do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Camp, seventh grade...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was great, Claire...my image of you is totally blown...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a shit!  Don't do that to her you swore to God you wouldn't laugh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Am I laughing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fucking prick! Bender turns to Andrew.  As he speaks, we can see his words hitting home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you care what I think, anyway?  I don't even count, right? I could disappear forever and it wouldn't make any difference...I may as well not even exist at this school, remember? (he turns to Claire)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you...don't like me anyway!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I have just as many feelings as you do and it hurts just as much when somebody steps all over them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God, you're so pathetic! (furious)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ever...ever!  Compare yourself to me!  Okay?  You got everything, and I got shit!  Fuckin' Rapunzel, right?  School would probably fucking shut down if you didn't show up!  "Queenie isn't here!"  I like those earrings Claire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quietly)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are those real diamonds, Claire?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (angry)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! BENDER                       CLAIRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet they are...did you work, for the money               Shut... for those earrings?                   Your mouth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or did your daddy buy those?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! Claire starts crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I bet he bought those for you!  I bet those are a Christmas gift! Right?  You know what I got for Christmas this year?  It was a banner fuckin' year at the old Bender family!  I got a carton of cigarettes.  The old man grabbed me and said "Hey!  Smoke up Johnny!" Okay, so go home'n cry to your daddy, don't cry here, okay? There are a few beats.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My God, are we gonna be like our parents?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not me...ever...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's unavoidable, it just happens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happens?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you grow up, your heart dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who cares? Allison is on the verge of tears herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I care...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um, I was just thinking, I mean.  I know it's kind of a weird time, but I was just wondering, um, what is gonna happen to us on Monday?  When we're all together again?  I mean I consider you guys my friends, I'm not wrong, am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, so on Monday...what happens?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we still friends, you mean? If we're friends now, that is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want the truth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I want the truth...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, do you mean all of us or just John?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With all of you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a real nice attitude, Claire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, be honest, Andy...if Brian came walking up to you in the hall on Monday, what would you do?  I mean picture this, you're there with all the sports.  I know exactly what you'd do, you'd say hi to him and when he left you'd cut him all up so your friends wouldn't think you really liked him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Kay, what if I came up to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same exact thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious and screaming at Claire)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a bitch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  'Cause I'm telling the truth, that makes me a bitch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  'Cause you know how shitty that is to do to someone!  And you don't got the balls to stand up to your friends and tell 'em that you're gonna like who you wanna like!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, what about you, you hypocrite! Why don't you take Allison to one of your heavy metal vomit parties?  Or take Brian out to the parking lot at lunch to get high?  What about Andy for that matter, what about me? What would your friends say if we were walking down the hall together. They'd laugh their asses off and you'd probably tell them you were doing it with me so they'd forgive you for being seen with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious once again)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ever talk about my friends!  You don't know any of my friends, you don't look at any of my friends and you certainly wouldn't condescend to speak to any of my friends so you just stick to the things you know, shopping, nail polish, your father's BMW and your poor--rich--drunk mother in the Carribean!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (furious and sobbing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And as far as being concerned about what's gonna happen when you and I walk down the hallways at school, you can forget it!  'Cause it's never gonna happen!  Just bury your head in the sand...and wait for your fuckin' prom!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?  Good! There is silence until Brian speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I assume Allison and I are better people than you guys, huh? Us weirdos... (to Allison)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you, would you do that to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have any friends...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well if you did?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...I don't think the kind of friends I'd have would mind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just wanna tell, each of you, that I wouldn't do that...I wouldn't and I will not!  'Cause I think that's real shitty...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your friends wouldn't mind because they look up to us... Brian laughs at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so conceited, Claire.  You're so conceited.  You're so, like, full of yourself, why are you like that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (crying again)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not saying that to be conceited! I hate it!  I hate having to go along with everything my friends say!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then why do you do it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, I don't...you don't understand..you don't.  You're not friends with the same kind of people that Andy and I are friends with! You know, you just don't understand the pressure that they can put on you! Brian is shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't understand what?  You think I don't understand pressure, Claire? Well fuck you!  Fuck you! Brian hides his head in his arm because he is crying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know why I'm here today?  Do you? I'm here because Mr. Ryan found a gun in the locker...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you have a gun in your locker?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I tried.  You pull the fuckin' trunk on it and the light's s'posed to go on...and it didn't go on, I mean, I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the gun for Brian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just forget it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You brought it up, man!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't have an F, I can't have it and I know my parents can't have it! Even if I aced the rest of the semester, I'm still only a B.  And everything's ruined for me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with pity)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Brian... Brian bashes a chair over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So I considered my options, you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!  Killing yourself is not an option!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I didn't do it, did I?  No, I don't think so!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a hand gun?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it was a flare gun, went off in my locker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? Andrew starts to laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not funny... They all start to laugh, including Brian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes it is...fuckin' elephant was destroyed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna know what I did to get in here?  Nothing...I didn't have anything better to do. Everyone laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're laughing at me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Allison starts to laugh too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Later. We see Brian putting a record on and then music starts. We see them all dancing.  This goes on for the duration of the song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Bender crawling back through the heating duct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrew, Allison, Claire and Brian are sitting, in that order on the railing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you gonna write your paper?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's kinda a waste for all of us to write our paper, don't you think?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, but that's what Vernon wants us to do...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True, but I think we'd all kinda say the same thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just don't want to write your paper...Right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True, but, you're the smartest, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with pride)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, well...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We trust you... Brian glances over at Allison and Andrew who nod in approval.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, I'll do it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great... Claire looks at Allison who looks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Allison)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where're we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! We see Claire putting eye make-up on Allison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't stick that in my eye!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not sticking it, just close... just go like that... Claire closes her eyes.  Allison mimics her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good... Claire puts the make-up on her and Allison squeals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know you really do look a lot better without all that black shit on your eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey...I like that black shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This looks a lot better...look up. We see Brian thinking about what he's going to write. We see Andrew just thinking. We see Allison and Claire again.  Claire is still putting make-up on Allison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, why're you being so nice to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Cause you're letting me. We see Brian begin to write. We see Andrew, still deep in thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Bender, in the closet once again.  Claire opens the door and enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You lost? Claire stares at him. Bender smiles. Claire smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brian is busily preparing the essay. Andrew looks up and sees the newly made over Allison and is in awe. Allison walks towards him and stops when she notices Brian staring at her with his mouth open. She glares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (smiling)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claire kisses Bender, then she breaks the kiss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd you do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Cause I knew you wouldn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know how you said before, how your parents used you to get back at each other...wouldn't I be outstanding in that capacity?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Were you really disgusted about what I did with my lipstick?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Truth... Bender nods and speaks at the same time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Brian lift up his paper and kiss it. We see Andrew and Allison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?  Claire did it!  What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing's wrong, it's just so different.  I can see your face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that good or bad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good! Allison smiles. We see Brian laugh and give himself a congratulatory punch in the arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The five are walking down the hall where they are met by Carl, sweeping up.  Brian nods at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See ya Brian...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey Carl...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Carl)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you next Saturday...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brian gets into his dadВ’s car and leaves. Andrew and Allison kiss, Allison rips a patch off AndrewВ’s jacket and gets into the car. Andrew's dad arrives and looks at him, then at Allison. Andrew gets into the car and they drive off. We see Claire take out one of her diamond earrings and put it into Benders hand.  They kiss and she gets into her car.  She leaves. We see Bender put the earring in his ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Vernon pick up Brian's essay and begin to read.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dear Mr. Vernon, we accept the fact that we had to sacrifice a whole Saturday in detention for whatever it was we did wrong.  But we think you're crazy to make an essay telling you who we think we are. You see us as you want to see us... In the simplest terms, in the most convenient definitions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see Bender walking towards us as Brian's monologue continues.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what we found out is that each one of us is a brain... ANDREW (VO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and an athlete...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and a basket case...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...a princess...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...and a criminal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Does that answer your question? Sincerely yours, the Breakfast Club. We see Bender walking across the football field as he thrusts his fist into the air in a silent cheer and freezes there. The Breakfast Club Starring...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Andrew Clark.............Emilio Estevez Richard Vernon...........Paul Gleason Brian Johnson............Anthony Michael Hall Carl.....................John Kapelos John Bender..............Judd Nelson Claire Standish..........Molly Ringwald Allison Reynolds.........Ally Sheedy
